JavaFX 24
  1. jfx.incubator.richtext
  2. jfx.incubator.scene.control.richtext.model

Uses of Package
jfx.incubator.scene.control.richtext.model

Packages that use jfx.incubator.scene.control.richtext.model
Package
Description
jfx.incubator.scene.control.richtext
Provides two controls for displaying and editing large, virtualized, rich text documents: RichTextArea and CodeArea.
jfx.incubator.scene.control.richtext.model
Provides common models for RichTextArea and CodeArea controls.
jfx.incubator.scene.control.richtext.skin
Contains RichTextArea skin and related classes.
  • Classes in jfx.incubator.scene.control.richtext.model used by jfx.incubator.scene.control.richtext
    Class
    Description
    CodeTextModel
    Editable plain text model with optional syntax highlighting for use with the CodeArea control.
    RichParagraph
    Represents a single immutable paragraph within the StyledModel.
    StyleAttribute
    Style Attribute provides a way to specify style in the RichTextArea.
    StyleAttributeMap
    This immutable object contains a map of StyleAttributes.
    StyledInput
    This interface represents a source of styled text segments for the purposes of pasting, importing, or loading from an input stream.
    StyledTextModel
    The base class for styled text models used by the RichTextArea.
  • Classes in jfx.incubator.scene.control.richtext.model used by jfx.incubator.scene.control.richtext.model
    Class
    Description
    BasicTextModel
    A StyledTextModel based on plain text paragraphs.
    BasicTextModel.Content
    This interface describes the underlying storage mechanism for the BasicTextModel.
    ContentChange
    Contains information about StyledTextModel content change.
    DataFormatHandler
    Facilitates import/export of styled text into/from a StyledTextModel.
    HtmlExportFormatHandler
    This partial DataFormatHandler supports export of styled text in a simple HTML format.
    ParagraphDirection
    Paragraph direction attribute.
    PlainTextFormatHandler
    DataFormatHandler which operates with plain text.
    RichParagraph
    Represents a single immutable paragraph within the StyledModel.
    RichParagraph.Builder
    Utility class for building immutable RichParagraphs.
    RichTextFormatHandler
    A DataFormatHandler for use with attribute-based rich text models.
    RtfFormatHandler
    This DataFormatHandler provides export/import support for RTF format.
    SimpleViewOnlyStyledModel
    A simple, view-only, in-memory, styled text model.
    StyleAttribute
    Style Attribute provides a way to specify style in the RichTextArea.
    StyleAttributeMap
    This immutable object contains a map of StyleAttributes.
    StyleAttributeMap.Builder
    StyleAttributeMap are immutable, so a Builder is required to create a new instance
    StyledInput
    This interface represents a source of styled text segments for the purposes of pasting, importing, or loading from an input stream.
    StyledOutput
    Class represents a consumer of styled text segments for the purposes of exporting, copying, or saving to an output stream.
    StyledSegment
    Data structure used to modify the styled text model.
    StyledSegment.Type
    StyledSegment type
    StyledTextModel
    The base class for styled text models used by the RichTextArea.
    StyledTextModel.Listener
    Receives information about modifications of the model.
    StyledTextModelViewOnlyBase
    The base class for view-only StyledTextModels.
